scripts.deploy:all: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn cdk deploy --all
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn cdk deploy prevalentware-boilerplate-stack-dev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn cdk deploy prevalentware-boilerplate-stack-prod --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:pipeline: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn cdk deploy prevalentware-boilerplate-cicd
